about_the_game:
Chlorophilia
- Virtual Reality Chlorophilia VR is a first-person virtual adventure developed by the Don Quixote studio.
Story takes place in the green megalopolis of the future. Participants control the main character who is thrown into a virtual-parallel world...He tries to find a way out following fantastic adventures. Players use VR equipment to interact with the environment. -manipulation of objects, -elements of puzzles and research.
Rest House (Episode One), was released in 2017. It has been released and can be found around.
Since 2016, our studio has been experimenting with VR prototypes. Rest House is a series of interactive projects in which we use modern methods and techniques with the help of classic and proven artistic forms of stories, pictures, film and music.
The VR content is inspired by ideas from classic literature and fantasy
Daily livestreams of production. Viewers have the opportunity to participate in the creation of projects and through their interaction influence the development of the story, character, sound and environment.

VR environment
Chlorophilia is another VR version of the Rest House interactive project. Like a teaser for the much h longer and larger – Chlorophilia Rest House 3 project.
Virtual adventure
Players control a character who tries to find salvation. The game includes elements of the previous episodes of the series such as exploration, puzzles and story.
Physically move around the space and use the analog sticks on your VR controller to move traditionally.
Here is the glimpse of the story that inspired this level and the next sequel. RH3.
The plot of Chlorophilia takes place six hundred years after the events of the Rest House 2.
The entire population moved to the capital. "No one owes anyone anything" is the motto under which the people live. Suddenly, in two days, the megalopolis was overgrown with grass the height of a television tower! The special correspondent of the famous journal learns from secret channels that everyone is leaving this place! Disaster! What will happen to the earth in the future? Doubt is also caused by something else - is the grass that has grown completely harmless to humans...
A social-psychological game about all-time and everyday human dilemmas, fears and needs. Dystopia and social-psychological fiction. One possible version of the future society, in which everyone is still looking for their place. ,, A hidden story about human existence and love’’.
The question arises of the value system of modern man and the world as a whole. Our Don Quixote studio is professionally involved in the creation of interactive content, including VR projects.
